name: YEH Der Mensch (DEMO) (EUROPE ONLY) (3 MAZES)
description:
If you live in another region (example: America, Japan), please find version of the game with your region (It's in the title of the game) (this game is ONLY FOR EUROPEANS)

Game has 3 mazes (It should have 50 mazes)

Game is just a complaton of small mazes

Use WASD and arrow keys at the same time to move

Press ENTER to start

Options doesnt work

Press SPACE BAR to use the switch at the end of the maze

If you really liked the game - you can help me creating more mazes and maybe I will add them
